hero.title: Discover Unique Artisan Products
hero.subtitle: Each piece in our collection tells a story. From hand-thrown ceramics to artisan jewelry, we curate exceptional handmade goods from talented makers around the world. Quality craftsmanship, sustainable materials, and timeless design.

about.title: Our Story
about.body: Artisan Collective was founded in 2016 with a mission to connect talented makers with people who appreciate quality craftsmanship. We partner with independent artisans and small studios who share our values: sustainable materials, fair wages, and timeless design. Every product is handmade with care, and every purchase supports creative communities.
about.subtitle: Our values

items.description: Curated set: ceramic dinnerware, linen napkins, scented candles, and wooden serving board

members.name: Sarah Chen
members.title: Ceramic Artist
members.bio: Sarah creates functional pottery from her studio in Vermont. Each piece is hand-thrown on the wheel and finished with her signature glazes inspired by nature.

members.name: Marcus Rodriguez
members.title: Jewelry Designer
members.bio: Marcus combines traditional metalsmithing with contemporary design. His pieces are handcrafted in precious metals using techniques passed down through generations.

members.name: Elena Petrov
members.title: Textile Artist
members.bio: Elena hand-weaves textiles on traditional looms using natural fibers and plant-based dyes. Her work celebrates slow fashion and sustainable practices.

items.text: The quality is outstanding! Each piece is truly unique and you can feel the care that went into making it. The packaging was beautiful too. Will definitely order again!
items.author: Jennifer Park

items.text: I love supporting independent artisans and this shop makes it easy. The curation is excellent and customer service is top-notch. These pieces are conversation starters!
items.author: David Thompson

items.text: Bought several pieces as gifts and everyone was thrilled! The quality and craftsmanship are exceptional. Worth every penny for truly unique, handmade items.
items.author: Maria Gonzalez

items.question: How do I place an order?
items.answer: Browse our collection and contact us via email or phone with the items you're interested in. We'll provide detailed information, confirm availability, and arrange payment and shipping.

items.question: Do you ship internationally?
items.answer: Yes! We ship worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. Contact us for a shipping quote to your country.

items.question: Are items exactly as shown in photos?
items.answer: Because each piece is handmade, there may be slight variations in color, size, or pattern. This makes your item unique! Photos are representative of the artisan's work.

items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: We accept returns within 14 days of delivery for items in original condition. Custom or personalized items are final sale. Please contact us before returning any item.

items.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
items.answer: Yes! We offer beautiful gift wrapping for $10 per item. Each package includes a handwritten gift note if you provide a message.

items.question: Can I request custom pieces?
items.answer: Many of our artisans accept custom commissions! Contact us with your idea and we'll connect you with the appropriate maker to discuss possibilities.

items.question: How do I care for handmade items?
items.answer: Each product includes specific care instructions from the artisan. Generally, handmade items require gentle care - hand wash ceramics, spot clean textiles, and store jewelry properly.

items.question: Do you have a physical store?
items.answer: Yes! Our showroom in Seattle is open Wednesday-Saturday. Visit to see products in person, meet some of our local artisans, and discover new makers.
